results.description: The opening round of 2020 Super League fixtures includes a repeat of the 2019 Grand Final between St Helens and Salford.
results.shortTitle: Saints start 2020 season against Salford
results.title: Super League 2020 fixtures: St Helens start v Salford, Toronto open v Castleford

thumbnail.altText: St Helens lift the Super League Grand Final trophy

results.description: Super League Grand Finalists St Helens and Salford will meet again when Magic Weekend returns to Newcastle in May 2020.
results.shortTitle: Grand Final repeat on Magic Weekend
results.title: Magic Weekend: St Helens and Salford to meet in Grand Final repeat

results.description: Super League club Hull FC hand 38-year-old forward Gareth Ellis a new one-year deal and sign Joe Cator from Leigh Centurions.
results.shortTitle: Hull FC hand Ellis new deal and sign Cator
results.title: Hull FC: Super League club sign Leigh's Joe Cator & hand Gareth Ellis new deal

results.description: Hull FC appoint Kieron Purtill to join Lee Radford's backroom staff after his resignation as the boss of Widnes Vikings.
results.shortTitle: Purtill leaves Widnes for Hull FC role
results.title: Kieron Purtill: Hull FC appoint former Widnes head coach to backroom staff

results.description: Wakefield Trinity sign back-rower Joe Westerman from fellow Super League side Hull FC on a two-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Wakefield sign Hull FC's Westerman
results.title: Joe Westerman: Wakefield Trinity sign Hull FC back-rower

results.description: Hull FC miss out on a place in the Super League play-offs as Tommy Makinson's first-half hat-trick steers St Helens to victory.
results.shortTitle: St Helens end Hull FC's play-off hopes
results.title: Super League: Hull FC 6-22 St Helens - leaders end Black and Whites' play-off hopes

thumbnail.altText: Tommy Makinson finished as Super League top try scorer this season with 23

results.description: London Broncos lose at Wakefield and are relegated from Super League - relive the action from Friday's five games.
results.shortTitle: London relegated from Super League - the action as it happened
results.title: Super League live: London Broncos relegated - the action as it happened

results.description: Castleford Tigers keep their hopes of reaching the Super League play-offs alive by beating Hull FC 44-12 to move up to fifth.
results.shortTitle: Tigers dominate Hull to go fifth
results.title: Super League: Castleford Tigers beat Hull FC 44-12 to go fifth in table

thumbnail.altText: Jake Trueman in action for Castleford Tigers

results.description: Castleford Tigers host Hull FC in the Super League - listen to BBC radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Castleford Tigers v Hull FC
results.title: Listen to Castleford Tigers v Hull FC commentary

results.description: Ireland's Joe Philbin, Scotland's Lachlan Coote and Wales' Morgan Knowles join Great Britain's elite performance squad.
results.shortTitle: Coote, Knowles and Philbin in GB squad
results.title: Great Britain Lions: Lachlan Coote, Morgan Knowles and Joe Philbin in elite performance squad

thumbnail.altText: Lachlan Coote, Joe Philbin and Morgan Knowles

results.description: Huddersfield score two late tries to take a huge stride towards Super League survival with a thrilling win over Hull FC.
results.shortTitle: Late burst earns Giants win at Hull FC
results.title: Super League: Hull FC 12-22 Huddersfield Giants

results.description: Hull FC host Huddersfield Giants while Castleford Tigers travel to St Helens in the Super League - listen to BBC Radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Friday's Super League commentaries
results.title: Listen to Hull FC v Huddersfield & St Helens v Castleford commentary

results.description: Hull FC forward Sika Manu is to retire from rugby league at the end of the Super League season.
results.shortTitle: Hull FC forward Manu to retire
results.title: Sika Manu: Hull FC forward to retire at end of Super League season

results.description: Hull miss the chance to go second in Super League as Salford win to keep their own Super League top-five hopes alive.
results.shortTitle: Salford score eight tries to beat Hull
results.title: Super League: Salford score eight tries to beat Hull FC 44-22 and go fifth

thumbnail.altText: Krisnan Inu scored two tries and kicked six goals for a 20-point individual haul

results.description: Hull FC host Salford Red Devils in the Super League - listen to BBC Radio Humberside commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Hull FC v Salford Red Devils
results.title: Listen to live commentary from Hull FC v Salford Red Devils

results.description: Hull FC confirm the signing of versatile Samoa forward Ligi Sao from next season on an initial two-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Hull FC confirm Sao signing for 2020
results.title: Ligi Sao joins Hull FC from New Zealand Warriors on two-year deal

results.description: Hull FC strengthen their Super League play-off hopes with victory at Wakefield Trinity, who remain in relegation trouble.
results.shortTitle: Hull FC beat Wakefield to enhance play-off bid
results.title: Super League: Hull FC beat Wakefield Trinity 26-16 to strengthen top-five hopes

results.description: Super League side Hull FC agree to sign hooker Jordan Johnstone from Widnes Vikings on a three-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Hull FC agree to sign Johnstone from Widnes
results.title: Jordan Johnstone: Hull FC agree to sign hooker from Widnes Vikings

thumbnail.altText: Jordan Johnstone in action for Widnes Vikings

results.description: Sunday's action in the Super League & Championship - listen to BBC local radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: Sunday's Super League & Championship commentaries
results.title: Listen to Super League & Championship commentaries

results.description: Super League club Hull FC sign Tevita Satae from New Zealand Warriors in the National Rugby League.
results.shortTitle: New Zealand Warriors' Satae joins Hull
results.title: Tevita Satae: Hull FC sign forward from NRL side New Zealand Warriors
